Title: One Good Cop
Plot: When NYPD detective Artie Lewis' colleague and friend is shot in a police operation, he and his wife Rita want to adopt his three little children. But they have to realize that their income doesn't suffice for the required larger home. So Artie decides to take the money from the drug-dealing mobster Benjamino.
Tagline: How far will one man go to be a good father and stay...One Good Cop
Stars: Michael Keaton, Rene Russo, Anthony LaPaglia
